QuestData.Title: The Fighting Spirit
QuestData.Description: Keegan wants the Mullans to take wing with'm eh? If there's a dwarf I'd fly for, he'd be it. Still, I don't get why he'd be sendin' an outsider to be recruitin' me - not right polite by my standards.$B$BI'm guessin' ya don't last 20 seconds with any of my boys, at the bar or in the battlefield. Prove me wrong. Take one of'm down in a fight and then I'll think about flyin' with ol' Keegan.
QuestData.LogDescription: Challenge and defeat one of the Mullan Gryphon Riders.
QuestData.CompletionText: Naw, I'll not be fightin' ya. Get in there and challenge one of my boys if you've got a gut on ya at all.
QuestData.RewardText: That's the stuff! Not half bad. You've got a bit of fight in ya after all.
